title: Reaction contest: hydrolysis versus intramolecular cyclisation reaction in alkyl squaramate esters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32126-32132
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04362F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marta Ximenis, Santiago Cañellas, Rosa M. Gomila, Bartomeu Galmés, Antonio Frontera, Antonio Costa, Carmen Rotger
The hydrolytic behavior and stability of squaramate esters have been investigated, shedding light on the competition between hydrolysis and intramolecular cyclization reactions, which is crucial for advancing bioconjugate chemistry applications.
